LanguageData.HAR_NM_Tshirt.label: T-shirt (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Tshirt.description: A T-shirt designed exclusively for Nearmare. It's eerily similar to that worn by humans.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Sc_Uniform.label: School Uniform (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Sc_Uniform.description: A school uniform worn by Nearmare when in civilized space. It seems to be catching on... Makes you feel like a student, increasing learning speed.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_SShirts.label: Long sleeved shirt (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_SShirts.description: A long sleeved shirt just like humans wear. Provides more protection than a T-shirt.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_BDress.label: Black Evening Gown (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_BDress.description: A revealing jet black dress worn by Nearmare nobles. Intended for aristocratic use, it's not crafted with defense in mind.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_WDress.label: White Evening Gown (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_WDress.description: An elegant, pure white dress worn by Nearmare nobles. Intended for aristocratic use, it's not crafted with defense in mind.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_China.label: China Clothes (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_China.description: A traditional garment custom made for Nearmare. Easy to move in, increasing movement speed.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Maid.label: Maid Clothes (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Maid.description: Servant clothing worn by Nearmare to curry favour with powerful individuals. Feeling like a maid increases work efficiency.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_DLArmor.label: Night Demon's Light Armor (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_DLArmor.description: Nearmare battle gear. Quite revealing, but projects an energy field for defense.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_KArmor.label: Cursed Armor (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_KArmor.description: A special equipment made for Nearmare, developed by a sect that used to study them. It provides poor defense, but enhances the senses, allowing for more precise movements.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Kimono.label: Kimono (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Kimono.description: Traditional attire custom-made for Nearmare. Difficult to move in, but such elegant attire makes a good impression during diplomacy.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Miko.label: Shrine Maiden Dress (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Miko.description: Traditional attire custom-made for Nearmare. It is difficult to move in, but makes a good impression and is comfortable in a variety of climates.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Itimai.label: Wrapped Fabric (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Itimai.description: A large piece of cloth wrapped around the body, too primitive to call clothing.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Blouse.label: Blouse (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Blouse.description: A lovely blouse for fashion-conscious Nearmare. Easy to make and comfortable to wear.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_RiderS.label: Riding Suit (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_RiderS.description: A strictly functional riding suit, eschewing unnecessary ornamentation. Provides minimal protection from both attacks and weather, but is easy to move in. Originally worn by motorcycle riders.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_NurseS.label: Nurse Attire (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_NurseS.description: The costumes worn by women involved in medical care. It inspires benevolent intentions in those who wear it, lowering combat-related abilities while improving surgery-related abilities.
